text:
Haha yes it was a great project to be on! And of course so cute :} ooo I think my fav will always be my first film (Paddington) Just cause it means more I guess haha!
No problem about the Mari issues, we can go through that :) and in terms of a call I can do anytime this week except for Wednesday! Give me a shout! And we can get started :grin:
